bug.author: danielhers
bug.summary: nlp.vocab.vectors.resize: dictionary changed size during iteration
bug.description:
Steps to reproduce: <denchmark-code>>>> import spacy >>> nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_md") >>> nlp.vocab.vectors.resize((100,80)) Traceback (most recent call last): File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> File "vectors.pyx", line 153, in spacy.vectors.Vectors.resize RuntimeError: dictionary changed size during iteration </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Info about spaCy</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.0.2 Platform: Linux-4.10.0-38-generic-x86_64-with-Ubuntu-17.04-zesty Python version: 3.5.3 Models: en, en_core_web_md

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
